Package com.github.actionfx.core.validation

Class AbstractRequiredValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.validation.AbstractRequiredValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanValidator, MinMaxValidator, RegExpValidator, RequiredValidator, SizeValidator, TemporalValidator
    public abstract class AbstractRequiredValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Validator
    Abstract base class for Validator implementations that need to ensure that a required value is provided, before the actual validation can take place.
    Author:
    koster

      • validateAfterRequiredCheck

        protected abstract ValidationResult validateAfterRequiredCheck​(ControlWrapper controlWrapper,
                                                               ControlProperties controlProperty)
        Derived classes can implement this method to perform specific validations after the "required" value check has been successfully performed, in case that is required.
        Parameters:
        controlWrapper - the control wrapper
        controlProperty - the control property to validate
        Returns:
        the validation result

      • convert

        protected <T> T convert​(java.lang.Object value,
                        java.lang.Class<T> targetType,
                        java.lang.String formatPattern)
        Convenient method to access ActionFX's conversion service for converting a given value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to convert into
        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert
        targetType - the target type
        formatPattern - optional and nullabe format pattern to use for conversion
        Returns:
        the converted value

      • canConvert

        protected <T> boolean canConvert​(java.lang.Object value,
                                 java.lang.Class<T> targetType,
                                 java.lang.String formatPattern)
        Convenient method to access ActionFX's conversion service for checking, whether a given value can be converted.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to convert into
        Parameters:
        value - the value to check
        targetType - the target type
        formatPattern - optional and nullabe format pattern to use for conversion
        Returns:
        true, if and only if the value can be converted to the given target type

      • isStringWithValue

        protected boolean isStringWithValue​(java.lang.Object value)
        Convenient method to check, if a value is a non-blank string value.
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        Returns:
        true, if the value is a non-blank string, false otherwise.
